column2: Hold it. The harbor is off-limits to outsiders. We can’t let just anyone inside. Sorry ’bout that.
What’s that? You want me to lend you my boat? But if I did that, I wouldn’t be able to go fishing!
Those machines are running around wreaking havoc everywhere. It’s so bad we can’t even go out fishing!
Now there’s nothing holding me back from going fishing! Ha ha, this is the life!
